21-0295.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a summary report from Economic Development Department staff regarding the Restaurant Retention Study and community outreach directed by the City Council on December 15, 2020.Chair Mungo spoke.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Mungo spoke.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and John Keisler, Director of Economic Development.Seiji Steimetz, Professor and Chair of Economics at CSULB, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Councilwoman Allen.A motion was made by Member Allen, seconded by Chair Mungo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Mungo and AllenAbsent: 1 - Richardson3.

21-0296.summary: Recommendation to conduct, receive and file a Study Session, andreceive input from Economic Development & Finance CommitteePage 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 12:00 PMTUESDAY, APRIL 6, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTESMembers and members of the public for the implementation of a racially equitable economic recovery strategy to help Long Beachbusinesses and workers quickly and effectively recover from the economic hardship caused by COVID-19 as approved by the CityCouncil on March 16, 2021. Vice Chair Richardson joined the meeting.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Mungo spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Councilwoman Allen.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilwoman Allen and John Keisler, Director of Economic Development.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Richardson and Councilwoman Allen.Chair Mungo spoke.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Vice Chair Richardson.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.Page 3 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 12:00 PMTUESDAY, APRIL 6, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTESA dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and John Keisler, Director of Economic Development.A motion was made by Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Mungo, Richardson and Allen4.
